results.name: Compound filter: a(n) = P(A089309(n), A046523(n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
comment: For all odd i, odd j: a(i) = a(j) <=> A286251(i) = A286251(j).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pairing Function
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 08 2017
